title: Socially
description:
The community building platform for creators, coaches, communities & businesses to sell memberships, events, private groups & so much more.

Socially is a saas based community building platform for NICHE communities. Since 2017 we have been iterating & creating products for the creator economy space enabling over 200 communities & empowering 4 niche social networks thus serving more than 150,000 users.
